name: df-evl
body: |- wceq(cevl, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cfv(co(cv(s0), ces, cv(s1)), cfv(cbs, cv(s1)))))

comment: A simplification of ` evalSub ` when the evaluation ring is the same as the coefficient ring. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 19-Mar-2015.)
